member.name: T:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField
member.summary: Represents properties of specific field in screen.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.attributes
member.summary: Gets the attributes collection of the currnet field.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Dup
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if this field has the Dup attribute. A field with the Dup attribute repeats hex 1C from the cursor position to the end of the field when the user presses the Dup key; this shows on the display as an asterisk.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Enptui
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the current field attribute is within an ENPTUI structured field.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Type
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the type of characters that can be entered in the field.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.AutoEnter
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the field is Auto Enter. If true, contents are sent to the host when the user either types a character in the last position of the field or presses the field exit key. The user does not have to press the enter key.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Detectable
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if this field has the Detectable attribute. A field with the Detectable attribute can be detected by the selector pen or the cursor select key.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.EndColumn
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the ending column of the field.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.EndRow
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the ending row of the field.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Hidden
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the field is hidden.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Length
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the length of the field.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Protected
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the field can accept input.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.StartColumn
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the column in which the field begins.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.StartPosition
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the starting position of the field as a presentation space position.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.StartRow
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the row in which the field begins.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that appears in the field.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.FieldExitRequired
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the user is required to press field exit after entering the last character.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.ModifiedDataTag
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the field has a Modified Data Tag attribute which indicates if the field was modified by the user.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.AutoSkip
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if this field has the Autoskip attribute. A field with the Autoskip attribute causes the cursor to skip over fields that are defined as protected and numeric.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEField.Intense
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if this field has the Intense attribute. A field with the Intense attribute is displayed with brighter intensity.

member.name: T:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.WatermarkStyleConstants
member.summary: Possible values for Style property contains a value indicating placement type.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.WatermarkStyleConstants.Tiled
member.summary: Tiles the window with the bitmap image. Tiling displays multiple copies of the image in its original size to fill the entire window.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.WatermarkStyleConstants.Centered
member.summary: Centers the bitmap image in the window. Centering retains the original size of the image.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.WatermarkStyleConstants.FitToWindow
member.summary: Stretches or shrinks the bitmap image to cover the entire window. If the bitmap image is too small in comparison to the window, the stretching may distort its appearance.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.WatermarkStyleConstants.FixedAspect
member.summary: Retains the ratio of height and width while stretching the watermark to cover the window. Part of the bitmap image may not be visible, depending on the difference between the bitmap's dimensions and the window's dimensions.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.WatermarkTextBackgroundConstants.Transparent
member.summary: Text within the watermark area appears as if it is part of the bitmap image.

member.name: T:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode
member.summary: lists the return codes for EHLLAPI functions supported by RDE API.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIOK
member.summary: Function completed successfully.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APINOTCONNECTED
member.summary: The application is not connected to a RUMBA session, the session ShortName is invalid, or the RUMBA display is not connected to the host. Be sure that ConnectPS was called previously and the ShortName is correct.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIPARAMETERERROR
member.summary: Incorrect Parameters were specified or the length is zero or greater than 128 bytes. Be sure the parameters are correct and are the right length.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIFTXCOMPLETE
member.summary: File transfer completed.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIFTXSEGMENTED
member.summary: File transfer completed and has segmented records.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIBUSY
member.summary: Function successfully completed but the presentation space is busy. The XCLOCK (Mainframe) or II (AS/400) is being displayed on the OIA.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APITRUNCATED
member.summary: Copy was completed, but the data was truncated. Be sure the data string length is correct.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIPOSITIONERROR
member.summary: The specified presentation space (integer) position is invalid. Commonly, a position of zero or a number larger than the size of the presentation space was specified.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APINOTAVAILABLE
member.summary: The specified operation is unavailable. No prerequisite function was issued.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APISYSERROR
member.summary: An unrecoverable system error was encountered.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APINOTSUPPORTED
member.summary: The emulation program does not support the function.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIUNAVAILABLE
member.summary: The specified resource is unavailable. Another EHLLAPI application may have connected to the specified RUMBA session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIPSENDED
member.summary: The session stopped. The user stopping the session usually causes this.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APINOTENABLED
member.summary: The API task cannot be performed because the RUMBA host control is embedded in another applicationâ€™s control.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIUNDEFINEDKEY
member.summary: Undefined keystroke combination.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIOIAUPDATE
member.summary: OIA has been updated.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIPSUPDATE
member.summary: Presentation space has been updated

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIBOTHUPDATE
member.summary: Both the OIA and the presentation space were updated

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APINOFIELD
member.summary: No such field was found. The presentation space may be unformatted.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APINOKEYSTROKES
member.summary: No keystrokes are available on the input queue.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIPSCHANGED
member.summary: The OIA or the presentation space was updated.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIZEROLINEFIELD
member.summary: The field length is 0 bytes

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIKEYOVERFLOW
member.summary: Keystroke Overflow. Keystrokes were lost

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIINVALIDPSID
member.summary: An Invalid ShortName was specified or a system error occurred.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIReturnCode.APIINVALIDRC
member.summary: An invalid ConvertType was specified or character 2 in the data string is not P or R.

member.name: T:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions
member.summary: HLLAPI type of functions.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.CONNECT_PRESENTATION_SPACE
member.summary: Links your program to a specific RUMBA session (presentation space).

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.DISCONNECT_PRESENTATION_SPACE
member.summary: Disconnects your program from a specific RUMBA session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.SEND_KEY
member.summary: Sends a string of keystrokes (characters or mnemonics) to the current session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.WAIT
member.summary: Checks the status of the current session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.COPY_PRESENTATION_SPACE
member.summary: Copies the entire host screen image (converted to ANSI) for the current session into your program buffer.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.SEARCH_PRESENTATION_SPACE
member.summary: Searches the presentation space for a specified string.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.QUERY_CURSOR_LOCATION
member.summary: Returns the position of the cursor in the current presentation space.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.COPY_PRESENTATION_SPACE_TO_STRING
member.summary: Copies all or part of the current presentation space into your program buffer.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.SET_SESSION_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Sets various EHLLAPI session parameters.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.QUERY_SESSIONS
member.summary: Returns the number of connected sessions and information about each session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.REVERSE
member.summary: Locks the mouse and keyboard to block operator input.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.RELEASE
member.summary: Ends the keyboard and mouse lock initiated by Reserve.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.COPY_OIA
member.summary: Returns the OIA (Operator Information Area or Status Line) data from the currently connected presentation space.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.QUERY_FIELD_ATTRIBUTE
member.summary: Returns the value of the attribute byte of a specified field.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.COPY_STRING_TO_PRESENTATION_SPACE
member.summary: Copies a string of data to the current presentation space.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.PAUSE
member.summary: Waits for a specified length of time.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.QUERY_SYSTEM
member.summary: Provides system information such as EHLLAPI version, level, date, and extended error codes.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.RESET_SYSTEM
member.summary: Disconnects the current RUMBA session and reinitializes the EHLAPI32.DLL.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.QUERY_SESSION_STATUS
member.summary: Gets information about a specified session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.START_HOST_INFORMATION
member.summary: Starts the process of determining if the presentation space and/or the OIA have been updated.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.QUERY_HOST_UPDATE
member.summary: Returns information on whether or not the host updated the presentation space and/or the OIA since this function was last called.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.STOP_HOST_NOTIFICATION
member.summary: Ends Start Host Notification and disables Query Host Update.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.SEARCH_FIELD
member.summary: Looks for a specified string in the target field.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.FIND_FIELD_POSITION
member.summary: Returns the beginning position of a target field.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.FIND_FIELD_LENGTH
member.summary: Returns the length of a target field.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.COPY_STRING_TO_FIELD
member.summary: Copies a string to the beginning of a target field.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.COPY_FIELD_TO_STRING
member.summary: Copies data from the target field to a string.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.DISPLAY_CURSOR
member.summary: Returns the position of the cursor in the current presentation space.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.DISPLAY_PS
member.summary: Gives the RUMBA session focus. If minimized, the session is restored to its original size and position.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.DELETE_PRESENTATION_SPACE
member.summary: Disconnects and closes a RUMBA session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.SET_CURSOR
member.summary: Positions the cursor in the currently connected presentation space.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.START_KEYSTROKE_INTERCEPT
member.summary: Enables the application to intercept keystrokes entered into the RUMBA session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.GET_KEY
member.summary: Intercepts a user keystroke from the session specified by Start Keystroke Intercept.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.POST_INTERCEPT_STATUS
member.summary: Issues a beep if your application rejects a keystroke from Get Key.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.STOP_KEYSTROKE_INTERCEPT
member.summary: Ends keystroke interception and disables Get Key.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.SEND_FILE
member.summary: Transfers a file from the PC to the host.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.RECEIVE_FILE
member.summary: Transfers a file from the host to the PC.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.CONVERT
member.summary: Converts presentation space position values into row/column coordinates and vice versa.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.CONNECT_WINDOW_SERVICES
member.summary: Allows the application to manage the presentation space windows.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.DISCONNECT_WINDOW_SERVICES
member.summary: Disconnects the window services between the EHLLAPI program and the specified RUMBA session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.QUERY_WINDOW_COORDINATES
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the RUMBA session window.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.WINDOW_STATUS
member.summary: Queries or changes a RUMBA session window's size, location, or visible state.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.CHANGE_WINDOW_NAME
member.summary: Changes or resets the window name of the RUMBA session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.RUN_PROFILE
member.summary: Starts a RUMBA session with a specified profile.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.SHOW_SESSION
member.summary: Changes the size and visibility of the connected RUMBA session window.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.GET_SESSION_HWND
member.summary: Returns the instance handle of the connected session.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.ADVICE_HOST_UPDATE
member.summary: Notifies your application when the presentation space or OIA is updated, or when a host disconnects the RUMBA session after a period of inactivity.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.RUN_MACRO
member.summary: Starts a RUMBA macro.

member.name: F:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.HLLAPIFunctions.SET_SESSION_PARAMETERS_EXTENDED
member.summary: Extends the options supported by Set Session Parameters.

member.summary: Returns the location of a selected block of data in the connected RUMBA session.

member.summary: Copies a block of data from the presentation space to a string. The target block may be specified by the PS position or by highlighting the block.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if this field has the Dup attribute. A field with the Dup attribute repeats hex 1C from the cursor position to the end of the field when the user presses the Dup key; this shows on the display as an asterisk.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the user is required to press field exit after entering the last character.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the field is hidden.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFieldProperties.AutoEnter
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the field is Auto Enter. If true, contents are sent to the host when the user either types a character in the last position of the field or presses the field exit key. The user does not have to press the enter key.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if this field has the Detectable attribute. A field with the Detectable attribute can be detected by the selector pen or the cursor select key.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if this field has the Autoskip attribute. A field with the Autoskip attribute causes the cursor to skip over fields that are defined as protected and numeric.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFieldProperties.Intense
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if this field has the Intense attribute. A field with the Intense attribute is displayed with brighter intensity.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the ending column of the field.

member.summary: Executes a batch file transfer.
member.param: The IStream or IStorage object that stores the transfer properties.
member.returns: Returns true if successful and false if not.

member.name: M:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the file transfer currently in progress.
member.returns: Returns true if successful and false if not.

member.summary: Opens the file transfer setup configuration dialog box for the user to configure general file transfer options.
member.returns: Returns a ConfigurationDialogConstants value containing the button pressed to dismiss the dialog.

member.name: M:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.Transfer
member.summary: Transfers a file between the host and the PC.
member.returns: Returns true if successful and false if not.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.AdditionalParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets additional file transfer parameters. There are no default AdditionalParameters. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.AnimationsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if animations are enabled during file transfer. The default value is true.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.AppendToHostFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the PC file is appended to the host file (send only). The default value is false.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.AppendToPCFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the host file is appended to the PC file (receive only). The default value is false.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.AutoList
member.summary: Returns or sets a value that indicates if the control automatically lists host files. The default value is true.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.BatchFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file transfer batch file. The default BatchFileName is "Default.FTB".

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.BatchList
member.summary: Gets or sets the file transfer batch list. There is no default BatchList. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.CharacterSet
member.summary: Gets or sets the character set to be used for file transfer. There is no default CharacterSet. The default value is an empty string. If no character set is selected the control will set a default character set.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.CicsDataSet
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the CICS data set to be used in file transfer. There is no default CicsDataSet. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.CmsFileMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the VM/CMS file mode to be used in file transfer. There is no default CmsFileMode. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.CmsFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the VM/CMS file to transfer. There is no default CmsFileName. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.CmsFileType
member.summary: Gets or sets the VM/CMS file type to be used in file transfer. There is no default CmsFileType. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.CmsRecordFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the VM/CMS record format to be used in file transfer. The default value is RecordFormatVariable.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.CmsRecordLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of a VM/CMS record to be used in file transfer. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.CRLFEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the file transfer is filtered to translate carriage return (CR) and line feed (LF) pairs to/from NL characters. The default value is true.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.DataType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data type of the file to be transferred. The default value is DataTypeText.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction (Send or Receive) of the transfer operation. The default value is TransferSend.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.ExplorerEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the file transfer enables Explorer-style dialog boxes (Windows 95, Windows 98, and NT 4.0 only). The default value is true.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.HostEnvironment
member.summary: Gets or sets the host environment. The default value is EnvironmentTSO.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.PCFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a PC file for the transfer operation. There is no default PCFileName. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.PrintOnReceipt
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the TransferPrintFile event is fired. The default value is PrintDisabled.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.ReceiveEnabled
member.summary: Returns or sets a value that indicates if the control allows files to be received from the host. The default value is true.

member.name: P:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEFTX.ScreenVerification

member.name: M:MicroFocus.RDE.Framework.IRDEConnection.SynchConnect(System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Use this method to establish a connection between the display session and the host using the currently selected interface, and to ensure that connection is complete and that the first host screen is ready to be processed or navigated. SynchConnect Method uses the Connect method to establish the host connection, and also includes host synchronization and verification code.
member.param: If true the method waits for the number of ReadyToSend events specified in the nWaitCount parameter. When false, this property waits for a "settle time" interval where no HostScreenChange events fire and RTS remains

When bWaitForEvents is true, specifies the number of ReadyToSend events to wait for When bWaitForEvents is false, specifies a default "settle time" in milliseconds of 1000 (that is, 10 seconds) if set to any value less than 101.
Specifies the time in milliseconds to wait if no other event causes the function to return. The default value is 10000 milliseconds if 0 is passed as this parameter.
(Optional, or blank if not used)Specifies a case-sensitive string to search for on the host screen. If an empty string is passed, this parameter is ignored.
Specifies the row to search for szVerString in the screen buffer.
Specifies the column to search for szVerString in the screen buffer.

item.description: bWaitForEvents is true and the number of ReadyToSend events in nWaitCount was reached, but szVerString was not found.
szVerString was found at the specified row and col. This occurred before the number of events was reached if bWaitForEvents is true, or before the settle time elapsed if bWaitForEvents is false.
The function terminated because the timeout interval elapsed.
The settle time elapsed, bWaitForEvents is false, and szVerString is blank or not found.
